summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FAQ and Questionnaire features for Silwer Lining Photography. All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working correctly: dynamic FAQs on HomePage and ContactPage, Admin FAQ management with CRUD operations, and questionnaire integration in booking flow with dynamic 4-step flow for Maternity sessions.
passed_tests: GET /api/faqs returns list of 4 active FAQs
FAQs have all required fields (question, answer, active, category)
FAQs filter by category works correctly
Admin can view all FAQs via /api/admin/faqs
Admin can create new FAQ
Admin can update existing FAQ
Admin can delete FAQ
GET /api/questionnaire/maternity returns questionnaire with 4 questions
Maternity questionnaire has correct question types (text, radio, checkbox, textarea)
All questionnaire questions have labels
Non-existent questionnaire returns empty questions array
Admin can view all questionnaires
Admin can view questionnaire by session type
Booking settings available via /api/booking-settings
Packages available for booking
Booking with questionnaire responses can be created
Questionnaire responses are stored in booking
Available times endpoint works
Available times with session type filter works
FAQs display dynamically on HomePage (4/4 FAQs found)
FAQs display dynamically on ContactPage (4/4 FAQs found)
Admin FAQ Management page loads with all FAQs
Admin Add FAQ dialog opens with form fields
Booking flow shows 4 steps when Maternity selected (with questionnaire)
Booking flow shows 3 steps when Newborn selected (no questionnaire)
Questionnaire step displays all 4 questions correctly
Questionnaire form accepts responses (text, radio, checkbox, textarea)
Booking flow progresses from questionnaire to contact details
seed_data_creation: Test data created during pytest (prefixed with TEST_) was automatically cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: FAQ and Questionnaire features fully tested and working. FAQs are fetched from /api/faqs and displayed on HomePage and ContactPage. Admin can manage FAQs at /admin/faqs. Maternity session has an active questionnaire with 4 questions that appears as Step 3 in the booking flow. Other session types (Newborn, Studio Portraits) show 3-step flow without questionnaire.

features: Fallback to default FAQs if API empty
